item.title: Immersive Media Installation on Particle-Wave Duality
item.description: The goal of this project is to let the audience experience quantum weirdness through immersive installation of music and projection, as if they are the photons in the famous double-slit experiment. The core of the installation incorporates the mathematical functions and patterns that describe quantum and/or physical properties into music and visuals. With Owen Setlik, Vigilance Brandon, and Alex Levinson. Supported by Bard Experimental Humanities Collaborative Network Micro-grant with final grant report.
